welcome_message_body: Welcome to Arden-Arcade, where the charm of historic neighborhoods meets the energy of vibrant shopping and dining. Known for its unique blend of urban and suburban, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sacramento International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Auburn Airport serves all domestic flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Auburn Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminals.
